p.s: I heard that you have banned the book The Hate U Give from your school libraries due to several reasons.
With this letter I am going to try to make you think about banning the book because I think that there are several reasons to let the students read the book not only in US but worldwide.
At first the book is a great way to teach the students rauid tolerance and it is way better way to teach it to them througthrough a novel than through a newspaper article or something else.
In addition to that the novel depicts a very recent topic which needs to be discussed in some way.

Furthermore the novel tells a story which has happened in a similar way very often and is a reflection of our society and our problems which makes it also a good reason to be teachedtaught to students.
Equally important the story encourages young students to stand up and speak up for their rights or say something when they see that something is not right.
With all that in mind I really hope that you would reconsider your decision about banning the novel and I hope it helped you understand my point of view.
